summary.title: About me
summary.description: I am a full stack developer having expertise in backend and front end development. I design and develop web applications using the latest technologies to deliver the product with quality code

career.title: Career Objective
career.description: I would like to be a part of an organization where I can use and enhance my knowledge, talent for the development of the organization and myself

companyList.name: Tech Mahindra Limited
description: ADOPT is an application to enable a fully integrated DevOps platform for automated software deployment. End-to-end DevOps platform supporting people, process and tools transformation, Real-Time governance, measurement, reporting and traceability, Standardization of process, and tooling/automation
Technologies: Spring Boot, Spring Data JPA, RESTful Web Services, Microservices, Groovy Script, JQuery, Ajax, Angular 7, HTML5, CSS, Bootstrap, MySQL, Maven, Tomcat, Microsoft IIS
Involved in the development of DAO and Service layer
Configured and extensively worked in automating various DevOps Tools like Jira, Jenkins, GitLab, SonarQube, Crowd, Microsoft IIS, Apache Tomcat, BitBucket, Maven, Gradle
Involved in the bug fixing (Generated by Fortify SCA, which is an application security testing tool) of the post-development of the applications
Involved in the development of interactive UI pages with HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JQuery

companyList.name: Juegostudio private limited
description: I was involved in game development using Java, JavaScript, C++ Technology and completed more than ten projects
Involved in the development of LetterSchool Educational app  /com.letterschool.lite
Involved in the development of 2048 Game for Hike Messenger using Cocos2d-x with the additional functionality of send and receive challenge as well as a one-step undo
Applied design patterns and principles (singleton, factory design pattern, data manager, touch controller, and grid manager)
Implemented efficient data structure for insert, search, delete operation (Reduced time from O(n) to O (log n))
Involved in the development of Oscar mobile app by using google flutter

key_projects.title: Personal Projects / Involvements
description: Designed and developed a web application called Labyrinth (online treasure hunt event) for NMAMIT college, using PHP on Laravel (MVC framework) with front-end in materialize CSS

Underwent a semester long course on soft skill entitled “Individual Effectiveness Lab” and week-long workshop titled “Impressive group workshop” for developing the organizational skills, both conducted by I-Pont, Mangalore
Competitive Programming at Hacker Rank and Hacker Earth

certificates.title: Certificates and Awards
description: Best performer award (X -- Excellent rating ) for consistently exceeding the performance
